metadata.title: CVE-2020-29370 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in kmem_cache_alloc_bulk in mm/slub.c in the Linuxkernel before 5.5.11. The slowpath lacks the required TID increment, akaCID-fd4d9c7d0c71.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-29370` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-179-generic - 4.4.0-179.209
